what.title: What is Wazzat?
what.description: Effortlessly connect every product to its digital identity. Wazzat simplifies asset tracking, documentation, and after-sales service—making information instantly accessible for manufacturers, contractors, and service teams. No more lost manuals or service history: just scan and go.

tag.title: 1. Tag
tag.description: Use QR codes (visible) or NFC/RFID (invisible) to label your products for easy identification.

enrich.title: 2. Link
enrich.description: Link the tag to a product or project.

share.title: 3. Track
share.description: Add photos, notes, documents, and internal metadata to create a complete service history.

items.title: Instant Access
items.description: Scan a QR code to get all product details and documentation instantly.

items.title: No More Lost Info
items.description: Keep documents & service history in one place, always accessible.

items.title: 10+ Years Archiving
items.description: Keep records available long-term for compliance and peace of mind.

items.title: Fast Service Handling
items.description: Customers can submit requests with one scan, simplifying the process.

items.title: Secure & Reliable
items.description: Your data is stored safely and accessible only to the right people.

items.title: Works on Any Modern Phone
items.description: No app needed, just scan and go with any smartphone camera.
